welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sunnyvale, where the sun shines bright and the charm of Silicon Valley awaits you. Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, vibrant downtown, and innovative tech scene â€“ we hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Santa Clara.
restaurants.address: 3001 Mission College Blvd, Santa Clara, CA 95054

restaurants.name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar
restaurants.description: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar is a steakhouse located in Santa Clara.

restaurants.name: Puesto Santa Clara
restaurants.description: Puesto Santa Clara is a mexican restaurant located in Santa Clara.
restaurants.address: 2752 Augustine Dr (at Bowers Ave), Santa Clara, CA 95054

restaurants.name: Chungdam
restaurants.description: Chungdam is a korean bbq restaurant located in Santa Clara.

restaurants.name: Pacific Catch
restaurants.description: Pacific Catch is a seafood restaurant located in Santa Clara.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Palo Alto Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport is a modern and spacious building with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Air Terminal Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle all types of cargo and shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Half Moon Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive amenities and services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.
